item.description: […] You can fit all of this and more into Contiki’s 12-day Costa Rica Unplugged tour. To find out more about this awesome trip, check out the itinerary, or read my blog about it here. […]

item.title: By: Saving Costa Rica's sea turtles - DUFF'S SUITCASE
item.dc:creator: Saving Costa Rica's sea turtles - DUFF'S SUITCASE
item.description: […] help the Sea Turtle Conservancy with their turtle conservation work. It was the second night of a 10-day journey through Costa Rica with Contiki and Celine Cousteau, a documentary filmmaker (and granddaughter of Jacques Cousteau, the legendary […]
